mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM reservation
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (korName, engName, phone, email, bigMidCategory, smallEtcCategory, reserveDateAndTime, reservePeople, preCharge, localCharge, currentDate) VALUES ( #{korName}, #{engName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{bigMidCategory}, #{smallEtcCategory}, #{reserveDateAndTime}, #{reservePeople}, #{preCharge}, #{localCharge}, now() )
INSERT INTO options (opBig, opMid, opSmall, opAdult, opKid, opBaby) VALUES ( #{opBig}, #{opMid}, #{opSmall}, #{opAdult}, #{opKid}, #{opBaby})
